Package it.polimi.se2019.network.message

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionRequestMessage
    Message used to request what action the players wants to do.
    AskOptionsMessage
    Message used to display a question and possible answer to a player.
    CoordinatesAnswerMessage
    Message used as answer with a Coordinates data.
    CoordinatesRequestMessage
    Message used to request a Coordinates to the Player, the Coordinates must be from a list of allowedCoordinates.
    EndGameMessage
    Message used to report the end of the game and the winners.
    EndRequestMessage
    Message used to request to the player his final action(s) when ending the turn.
    GameConfigMessage
    Message used to request and to display the configurations of the game.
    IntMessage
    Message used to exchange information with just one integer.
    Message
    General Message class.
    NicknameMessage
    Message used for player nicknames.
    PaymentMessage
    Message used for requesting payments with ammo cubes or powerups.
    RepMessage
    Message used to send the reps of the model to the player.
    RequestChoiceInArrayMessage
    Message used to request a choice in an array.
    RequestChoiceWithExtraInfo
    Message used to request a choice in an array, but adding an extra info.
    StringMessage
    Message used to exchange information with just one string.
    SwapMessage
    Message used for the answer of SWAP_WEAPON action.
    TimerForStartMessage
    Message used to report the start of the timer for the game start.
    WaitingPlayersMessage
    Message used to send the current players waiting in the wating room.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MessageSubtype
    Enum containing all the possible message subtypes.
    MessageType
    Enum containing all the possible message types.
